item.title: 美国股市期货上涨，欧盟贸易前景看好：市场综述
item.description: 在布鲁塞尔表示同意加快与美国的谈判以避免跨大西洋贸易战之后，美国股票期货周二上涨，追随欧洲股市走高。【原文：US stock futures rose on Tuesday, tracking European shares higher after Brussels said it agreed to accelerate negotiations with the US to avoid a transatlantic trade war.】

item.title: 收购搁置：Seven & i 投资者在支持交易或战略前关注执行情况
item.description: 尽管公司面临 Circle K 连锁店运营商 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.【原文：The annual meeting of Seven & i Holdings Co. shareholders is likely to be a low-key event, despite the drama surrounding a company facing a takeover proposal by Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc., the operator of Circle K stores.】

item.title: 马克-扎克伯格现在爱 MAGA。MAGA 还会爱他回来吗？
item.description:
美达公司首席执行官竭尽全力争取特朗普的支持，但目前还不清楚他有多少成果。【原文：

Meta’s CEO has done everything he can to win over Trump, and it’s not clear how much he has to show for it.

】

item.title: 阿根廷通过比索债券销售重返全球市场
item.description: 阿根廷政府将发行以比索计价的五年期债券，主要面向允许以美元购买债券的国际投资者，此举被阿根廷政府誉为在大流行病期间进行主权重组后重返全球市场。【原文：Argentina’s government will issue a five-year bond denominated in pesos that’s aimed at international investors who are allowed to purchase it in US dollars, a move the government hailed as its return to global markets after a sovereign restructuring during the pandemic.】

item.title: 查尔斯国王访问加拿大，特朗普的嘲讽令加拿大震怒
item.description: 应加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）的邀请，国王查尔斯三世抵达加拿大，为新一届议会会议揭幕，此举部分是为了向美国总统唐纳德-特朗普传递有关这个北方国家主权的信息。【原文：King Charles III arrived in Canada to open a new parliamentary session at the invitation of Prime Minister Mark Carney, a move designed in part to send a message to US President Donald Trump about the northern country’s sovereignty.】

item.title: 价值 650 亿美元的荷兰投资者向美国基金经理发出通知
item.description: 荷兰养老基金 PME 正在向美国的基金经理发出全面警告，因为人们担心美国的投资行业正在屈服于特朗普政府的压力，放弃基本的管理原则。【原文：Dutch pension fund PME is issuing a blanket warning to US money managers, amid concerns America’s investment industry is caving in to pressure from the Trump administration to abandon basic principles of stewardship.】

item.title: 津巴布韦预计到 2026 年初将有 26 亿美元的过桥融资到位
item.description: 津巴布韦财政部长姆图利-恩库比（Mthuli Ncube）表示，津巴布韦预计将在明年第一季度之前获得偿还国际金融机构债务和重新进入资本市场所需的 26 亿美元过桥资金。【原文：Zimbabwe expects the $2.6 billion bridge finance — needed to repay debt owed to international financial institutions and regain access to capital markets — to be in place by the first quarter of next year, Finance Minister Mthuli Ncube said.】

item.title: Charterhouse 将冰淇淋制造商 Casa Optima 出售给 Terlos
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Charterhouse Capital Partners 已同意将冰淇淋和糕点配料生产商 Casa Optima 出售给以消费者为重点的私募股权公司 Terlos 为首的一批投资者。【原文：Charterhouse Capital Partners has agreed to sell Casa Optima, a gelato and pastry ingredient maker, to a group of investors led by consumer-focused private equity firm Terlos, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 销售额被夸大后，美国检察官索要 Builder.ai 数据
item.description: 美国检察官要求 Builder.ai 交出财务报表和其他文件，这表明这家人工智能公司在破产前的几周内正面临法律审查。【原文：US prosecutors demanded that Builder.ai hand over financial statements and other documents, signaling that the artificial intelligence company was facing legal scrutiny in the weeks before it went bust.】

item.title: 巴西不断搞砸预算，令投资者忧心忡忡
item.description: 上周，巴西宣布了一项旨在加强国家预算的措施，结果却引发了市场大跌，巴西人明显感到了似曾相识的感觉。【原文：An unmistakable sense of deja vu hit Brazil last week when an announcement of measures meant to shore up the nation’s budget sparked a market selloff instead.】

item.title: 新西兰央行将第六次降息并释放更多宽松信号
item.description: 由于美国贸易壁垒令经济前景黯淡，新西兰央行将连续第六次降息，并表示对进一步宽松持开放态度。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank is set to cut interest rates for a sixth straight meeting and signal it’s open to further easing as US trade barriers dim the economic outlook.】

item.title: 部长称南非可通过新预算吸引投资者
item.description: 南非基础设施部长表示，由于第三轮预算得到了联合政府的支持，南非可以集中精力重建经济，重新唤起投资者的兴趣。【原文：South Africa can focus on rebuilding the economy and resuscitating investor interest now that the third iteration of the budget has the support of the nation’s coalition government, the infrastructure minister said.】

item.title: 智利左翼总统候选人就 SQM 与科德尔科公司的交易展开争论
item.description: 智利左翼总统竞选人就锂供应商 SQM 与国有企业 Codelco 去年签署的一项具有里程碑意义的协议发生冲突，凸显了该行业初选投票前的分歧。【原文：Chile’s left-leaning presidential contenders clashed over a landmark deal signed last year between lithium supplier SQM and state-owned Codelco, highlighting differences ahead of the sector’s primary vote.】

item.title: 印度 NSE 计划寻求周二到期的衍生品合约
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，世界上处理衍生品合约数量最多的交易所计划申请将其到期日从周四改为周二。【原文：The exchange that handles the highest number of derivatives contracts in the world plans to apply to change its expiry date to Tuesday from Thursday, according to a person with knowledge of the matter, pitting itself directly against its rival to clawback market share as the regulator seeks to curb excessive trading.】

item.title: CaixaBank 回击葡萄牙反对西班牙银行的声音
item.description: 葡萄牙储蓄银行（CaixaBank SA）葡萄牙分行行长试图驳斥关于西班牙银行在葡萄牙影响力过大的批评，称当其他银行撤资时，西班牙银行的投资对加强葡萄牙金融业至关重要。【原文：The head of CaixaBank SA’s Portuguese unit sought to refute criticism that Spanish banks have too much influence in the country, saying their investment was vital in strengthening Portugal’s finance industry when others pulled back.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"代表称将七月产量呼吁提前一天至 5 月 31 日
item.description: 代表们说，"欧佩克+"将决定八个主要成员国 7 月份石油产量水平的视频会议提前一天到 5 月 31 日举行。【原文：OPEC+ brought forward a video-conference that will decide July oil production levels for eight key members by one day to May 31, delegates said.】

item.title: 苏里南大选陷入僵局，新发现的石油财富岌岌可危
item.description: 苏里南两大政党在周日的选举中几乎打成平手，这引发了激烈的联合谈判，以决定谁将管理即将到来的石油财富，苏里南的政治前途岌岌可危。【原文：Suriname’s political future hangs in the balance after the two main parties were virtually tied in Sunday’s election, triggering intense coalition talks to determine who will get to manage the upcoming oil bonanza.】

item.title: 随着气温升高，阿尔伯塔省油井附近发生野火
item.description: 上周末，炎热的天气在艾伯塔省引发了一系列野火，其中一些野火就发生在加拿大自然资源有限公司（Canadian Natural Resources Ltd.）等公司经营的油气井附近。【原文：Hot weather sparked a string of wildfires around Alberta over the weekend, including some near oil and gas wells operated by Canadian Natural Resources Ltd. and others.】

item.title: 大一生命认为日本国债市场波动性将在年底前降低
item.description: 日本最大的上市人寿保险公司第一生命控股公司（Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc.【原文：The surging bond yields that have saddled Japan’s insurers with billions of dollars in unrealized losses will weaken because they are not supported by economic fundamentals, according to Dai-ichi Life Holdings Inc., the country’s largest listed life insurer.】

item.title: IndiGo 的 Gangwal 寻求从股票出售中获得 8.03 亿美元，条款显示
item.description: 印度最大航空公司 IndiGo 的联合创始人拉克什-甘瓦尔（Rakesh Gangwal）及其家族信托基金正在寻求从出售该航空公司 3.4% 的股份中获得高达 8.03 亿美元的资金，这位亿万富翁还在继续减持其在运营商 InterGlobe Aviation Ltd. 的股份。【原文：Rakesh Gangwal, the co-founder of India’s largest airline IndiGo, and his family trust are seeking as much as $803 million from the sale of 3.4% stake in the carrier, as the billionaire continues to reduce his holding in operator InterGlobe Aviation Ltd.】

item.title: 欧盟命令 Shein 处理违反消费者权益法的行为，否则将面临罚款
item.description: 欧盟监管机构警告总部位于新加坡的电子商务公司Shein Group Ltd.，如果不打击其平台上违反消费者保护规定的行为，就可能面临罚款。【原文：Shein Group Ltd., the Singapore-based e-commerce firm, was warned by European Union regulators it could face fines unless it clamps down on consumer protection violations on its platform.】

item.title: 拉加德加倍努力提升欧元的全球形象
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统反复无常的政策为加强欧元的国际作用提供了一个 "绝佳机会"，使欧元货币集团能够享有更多迄今为止只属于美国的特权。【原文：President Donald Trump’s erratic policies offer a “prime opportunity” to strengthen the euro’s international role and allow the currency bloc to enjoy more of the privileges so far reserved for the US, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 印度 NSE 出价 1.18 亿美元解决 Sebi 案，重启 IPO
item.description: 据一位参与商讨的人士透露，印度国家证券交易所有限公司（National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.）据说将提供创纪录的约 100 亿卢比（约合 1.18 亿美元）的资金，以解决与该国市场监管机构之间的长期争端，这很可能为其公开上市铺平道路。【原文：The National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. is said to be offering a record amount of about 10 billion rupees ($118 million) to settle a longstanding dispute with the country’s market regulator, according to a person involved in the discussions, likely paving the way for its public listing.】

item.title: 通胀飙升，加沙战争升级，以色列维持利率不变
item.description: 以色列中央银行连续第 11 次维持利率不变，在加沙军事行动增加和通货膨胀率上升的情况下保持观望立场。【原文：Israel’s central bank kept interest rates on hold for the 11th time in a row, maintaining a wait-and-see stance amid increased military operations in Gaza and an uptick in inflation.】

item.title: 石油暴跌和贸易战导致加拿大西部钻井用地销售下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战和欧佩克+的增产打击了原油价格，加拿大西部石油中心阿尔伯塔省的钻井权销售热潮正在消退。【原文：A boom in sales of drilling rights in western Canada’s oil heartland of Alberta is fading as US President Donald Trump’s trade war and OPEC+ production increases hammer crude prices.】

item.title: 蒂森克虏伯计划结束企业集团时代，谋求扭亏为盈
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）计划转型为一家控股公司，拥有独立业务单位的多数股权，这标志着其作为完全一体化工业集团的时代即将结束。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG plans to transform itself into a holding company with majority stakes in standalone business units, marking the end of its era as a fully integrated industrial conglomerate.】

item.title: 巴里克称马里收购金矿缺乏法律依据
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. said Mali’s request to put the company’s gold operations in the West African country into provisional administration has no legal justification.】

item.title: 挪威国家银行将主动型基金经理霍尔贝格出售给挪威亿万富翁
item.description: 挪威国家银行（DNB Bank ASA）的投资银行部门将其持有的主动型基金管理公司霍尔贝格（Holberg）的股份出售给挪威亿万富翁克里斯汀-斯维亚斯（Christen Sveaas）的投资公司Kistefos AS，出售金额未披露。【原文：DNB Bank ASA’s investment banking unit sold its stake in active fund manager Holberg to Kistefos AS, the investment company of Norwegian billionaire Christen Sveaas, for an undisclosed amount.】

item.title: 大型矿商希望新鲜血液解决老问题
item.description:
该行业正在涌现新的领导者。但这可能还不足以说服信心不足的投资者。【原文：

New leaders are coming into the sector. That may not be enough to convince underwhelmed investors.

】

item.title: 特朗普关税紧张局势加剧，中欧贸易首脑将会晤
item.description: 欧盟和中国的高级贸易官员计划于下月初再次会晤，这再次表明双方都在加强接触，试图回击唐纳德-特朗普施加的关税压力。【原文：Top trade officials from the European Union and China are planning to meet again early next month, another sign that both sides are stepping up engagements as they try to push back against tariff pressure from Donald Trump.】
